    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112490</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112490</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Clothes 1</string>
            <string language="en">Clothes 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleidet 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vêtx 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Veste 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Copre 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενδύματα 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arropa 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this exercise you learn some words for different kinds of clothes. Contains both sound and text.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you learn some words for different kind of clothes. Contains both sound and text. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">clothes</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">clothes</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung erlernen Sie einige Wörter für
unterschiedliche Art von Kleidung. Enthält Ton und Text. 
Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - 
wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous apprenez quelques mots 
pour le genre différent de vêtements. Contient le bruit et le 
texte. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - 
module 2 - combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você aprende algumas palavras 
para o tipo diferente da roupa. Contem  o som e o texto. 
Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - 
módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione imparate alcune parole per
il genere differente di vestiti. Contiene sia il suono che il 
testo. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo
2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση μαθαίνετε μερικές λέξεις για το 
διαφορετικό είδος ενδυμάτων. Περιέχει και τον ήχο και το 
κείμενο. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για 
τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted aprende algunas palabras 
para diversa clase de ropas. Contiene el sonido y el texto. 
¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo
2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleidung</string>
          </keyword>
